name: myWidget recommendations
author: widget.my.com

sections.description: myWidget – is a tool for increasing the level of reader involvement. myWidget creates personalized recommendations for your readers and shows it on the pages of your site. Through session depth and time are increasing.
sections.installation:
Requirements

  • PHP 5.2 or higher
  • WordPress v3.0.x or higher

Installation Process

  • Log into the WordPress admin for your site
  • Go to ‘Plugins’ -> ‘Add New’
  • Search for ‘myWidget recommendations’. Once found click on ‘Install Now’
  • Select ‘Activate Plugin’ from the download page or go to ‘Plugins’ -> ‘Installed Plugins’ -> ‘Activate Plugin’

Deploy widgets

  • Go to Appearance -> Widgets
  • Drag the ‘myWidget Recommendations’ widget to where you would like it to be located
  • Enter the ‘cid’
  • Click on ‘Save’
  • Go take a look at your site!
sections.faq:
Installation Instructions

Requirements

  • PHP 5.2 or higher
  • WordPress v3.0.x or higher

Installation Process

  • Log into the WordPress admin for your site
  • Go to ‘Plugins’ -> ‘Add New’
  • Search for ‘myWidget recommendations’. Once found click on ‘Install Now’
  • Select ‘Activate Plugin’ from the download page or go to ‘Plugins’ -> ‘Installed Plugins’ -> ‘Activate Plugin’

Deploy widgets

  • Go to Appearance -> Widgets
  • Drag the ‘myWidget Recommendations’ widget to where you would like it to be located
  • Enter the ‘cid’
  • Click on ‘Save’
  • Go take a look at your site!
